item.text: King Belshazzar prepared a great banquet for 1,000 of his nobles, and he was drinking wine in front of them all.

While under the <st data-num="02939" class="">influence</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="02562" class="">wine</st>, <st data-num="01113" class="">Belshazzar</st> <st data-num="0560" class="">issued an order</st> to <st data-num="0858" class="">bring in</st> the <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="03984" class="">vessels</st>—the ones <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05020" class="">Nebuchadnezzar</st> his <st data-num="02" class="">father</st><n id="2" /> had <st data-num="05312" class="">confiscated</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01965 01768">temple</st> in <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="4" />—so that the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> and his <st data-num="07261" class="">nobles</st>, together with his <st data-num="07695" class="">wives</st> and his <st data-num="03904" class="">concubines</st>, could <st data-num="08355" class="">drink</st> from them.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="0116" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="0858" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03984" class="">vessels</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> had been <st data-num="05312" class="">confiscated</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01965" class="">temple</st>, the <st data-num="01768 01005">house</st> of <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="01768 03390">Jerusalem</st>, and the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> and his <st data-num="07261" class="">nobles</st>, together with his <st data-num="07695" class="">wives</st> and <st data-num="03904" class="">concubines</st>, <st data-num="08355" class="">drank</st> from them.
As they drank wine, they praised the gods of gold and silver, bronze, iron, wood, and stone.
At that very moment the fingers of a human hand appeared and wrote on the plaster of the royal palace wall, opposite the lampstand. The king was watching the back of the hand that was writing.

<st data-num="0116" class="">Then</st> all the <st data-num="02122" class="">color</st> <st data-num="08133" class="">drained</st> from the <st data-num="04430" class="">king’s</st> face,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07476" class="">he</st> became <st data-num="0927" class="">alarmed</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="07001" class="">joints</st> of his <st data-num="02783" class="">hips</st> <st data-num="08271" class="">gave way</st>,<n id="3" /> and his <st data-num="0755" class="">knees</st> began <st data-num="05368" class="">knocking</st> <st data-num="01668 01668">together</st>.

The king called out loudly to summon the astrologers, wise men, and diviners. The king proclaimed to the wise men of Babylon that anyone who could read this inscription and disclose its interpretation would be clothed in purple and have a golden collar placed on his neck and be third ruler in the kingdom.
So all the king’s wise men came in, but they were unable to read the writing or to make known its interpretation to the king.
Then King Belshazzar was very terrified, and he was visibly shaken. His nobles were completely dumbfounded.
Due to the noise caused by the king and his nobles, the queen mother then entered the banquet room. She said, “O king, live forever! Don’t be alarmed! Don’t be shaken!

<st data-num="0383" class="">There is</st> a <st data-num="01400" class="">man</st> in your <st data-num="04437" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">who</st> has within him a <st data-num="07308" class="">spirit</st> of the <st data-num="06922" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st>. In the <st data-num="03118" class="">days</st> of your <st data-num="02" class="">father</st>, he <st data-num="07912" class="">proved to have</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05094" class="">insight</st>, <st data-num="07924" class="">discernment</st>, and <st data-num="02452" class="">wisdom</st> like <st data-num="02452" class="">that</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="04430" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05020" class="">Nebuchadnezzar</st> your <st data-num="02" class="">father</st> <st data-num="06966" class="">appointed</st> him <st data-num="07229" class="">chief</st> of the <st data-num="02749" class="">magicians</st>, <st data-num="0826" class="">astrologers</st>, <st data-num="03779" class="">wise men</st>, and <st data-num="01505" class="">diviners</st>.<n id="4" />

Thus there was found in this man Daniel, whom the king renamed Belteshazzar, an extraordinary spirit, knowledge, and skill to interpret dreams, explain riddles, and solve difficult problems. Now summon Daniel, and he will disclose the interpretation.”
So Daniel was brought in before the king. The king said to Daniel, “Are you that Daniel who is one of the captives of Judah, whom my father the king brought from Judah?

I have <st data-num="08086" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">about</st> you, <st data-num="01768" class="">how</st> there is a <st data-num="07308" class="">spirit</st> of the <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st> in you, and how you <st data-num="07912" class="">have</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05094" class="">insight</st>, <st data-num="07924" class="">discernment</st>, and <st data-num="03493" class="">extraordinary</st> <st data-num="02452" class="">wisdom</st>.

<st data-num="03705" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="02445" class="">wise men</st> and<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0826" class="">astrologers</st> were <st data-num="05954" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="06925" class="">before</st> me <st data-num="01768" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07123" class="">read</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03792" class="">writing</st> and <st data-num="03046" class="">make known</st> to me its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>. But they <st data-num="03809 03546">were unable</st> to <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> the <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st> of the <st data-num="04406" class="">message</st>.

However, I have heard that you are able to provide interpretations and to solve difficult problems. Now if you are able to read this writing and make known to me its interpretation, you will wear purple and have a golden collar around your neck and be third ruler in the kingdom.”
But Daniel replied to the king, “Keep your gifts, and give your rewards to someone else. However, I will read the writing for the king and make known its interpretation.

As for <st data-num="0607" class="">you</st>, O <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>, the <st data-num="05943" class="">most high</st> <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="03052" class="">bestowed</st> on your <st data-num="02" class="">father</st> <st data-num="05020" class="">Nebuchadnezzar</st> a <st data-num="04437" class="">kingdom</st>, <st data-num="07238" class="">greatness</st>, <st data-num="03367" class="">honor</st>, and <st data-num="01923" class="">majesty</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="04481" class="">Due to</st> the <st data-num="07238" class="">greatness</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="03052" class="">bestowed</st> on him, <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05972" class="">peoples</st>, <st data-num="0524" class="">nations</st>, and <st data-num="03961" class="">language groups</st> <st data-num="01934" class="">were</st> <st data-num="02112" class="">trembling</st> with <st data-num="01763" class="">fear</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04481 06925">before</st> him. He <st data-num="01934 06992">killed</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="01934 06634">wished</st>, he <st data-num="01934 02418">spared</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="01934 06634">wished</st>, he <st data-num="01934 07313">exalted</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="01934 06634">wished</st>, and he <st data-num="01934 08214">brought low</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="01934 06634">wished</st>.

And <st data-num="01768" class="">when</st> his <st data-num="03825" class="">mind</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07313" class="">became arrogant</st><n id="2" /> and his <st data-num="07308" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="08631" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="02103" class="">pride</st>, he was <st data-num="05182" class="">deposed</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="04437" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="03764" class="">throne</st>, and his <st data-num="03367" class="">honor</st> was <st data-num="05709" class="">removed</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> him.

He was driven from human society; his mind was changed to that of an animal. He lived with the wild donkeys, he was fed grass like oxen, and his body became damp with the dew of the sky, until he came to understand that the most high God rules over human kingdoms, and he appoints over them whomever he wishes.
“But you, his son Belshazzar, have not humbled yourself, although you knew all this.

Instead, you have <st data-num="07313" class="">exalted</st> yourself <st data-num="05922" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="04756" class="">Lord</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st>. You <st data-num="0858" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="06925" class="">before</st> you the <st data-num="03984" class="">vessels</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st>, and <st data-num="0607" class="">you</st> and your <st data-num="07261" class="">nobles</st>, together with your <st data-num="07695" class="">wives</st> and <st data-num="03904" class="">concubines</st>, <st data-num="08355" class="">drank</st> <st data-num="02562" class="">wine</st> from them. You <st data-num="07624" class="">praised</st> the <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st> of <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="05174" class="">bronze</st>, <st data-num="06523" class="">iron</st>, <st data-num="0636" class="">wood</st>, and <st data-num="069" class="">stone</st>—gods<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03809" class="">cannot</st> <st data-num="02370" class="">see</st> <st data-num="03809" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08086" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="03809" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03046" class="">comprehend</st>. But you have <st data-num="03809" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01922" class="">glorified</st> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">who</st> has in his <st data-num="03028" class="">control</st><n id="2" /> your very <st data-num="05396" class="">breath</st> and <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="0735" class="">ways</st>!
Therefore the palm of a hand was sent from him, and this writing was inscribed.
“This is the writing that was inscribed: mene, mene, teqel, and pharsin.
This is the interpretation of the words: As for Mene—God has numbered your kingdom’s days and brought it to an end.
As for Teqel—you are weighed on the balances and found to be lacking.
As for Peres—your kingdom is divided and given over to the Medes and Persians.”
Then, on Belshazzar’s orders, Daniel was clothed in purple, a golden collar was placed around his neck, and he was proclaimed third ruler in the kingdom.

And that very <st data-num="03916" class="">night</st> <st data-num="01113" class="">Belshazzar</st>, the <st data-num="03779" class="">Babylonian</st> <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>,<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="06992" class="">killed</st>.<n id="2" />
(6:1) So Darius the Mede took control of the kingdom when he was about sixty-two years old.
